metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12783 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Exim through 4.93 has an out-of-bounds read in the SPA authenticator that could result in SPA/NTLM authentication bypass in auths/spa.c and auths/auth-spa.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5
exim4-base - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5
exim4-config - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5
exim4-daemon-light - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5
eximon4 - 4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.90.1-1ubuntu1.5').
